name: Jimmy Stewart's Lunar Apocalypse: It's a Wonderful Death
name_original: Jimmy Stewart's Lunar Apocalypse: It's a Wonderful Death
description:
The world's first James Stewart Astronomical Catastrophe Simulator! Keep the fort held down, literally, while your scientist friend heads to the lab to stop that moon being lassoed in.

Made for the 2020 Github Game Off game jam.

Instructions:

Move with Arrow Keys, interact with Space, pause with P.

Attach vital lab equipment to the ground before they float up to the moon.

Your speed is directly proportional to your power, use the blue charging station to recharge.

Programming, sound, "art", and music all by Sam Tuson. For more music by me visit https://nonlocalitymusic.bandcamp.com/.

CRT Buzz Sound Effect: https://freesound.org/people/blaukreuz/sounds/440128/
